trans-unit.source: Represents a state in a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Egy állapotának felel egy <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The StateActivity represents a State in a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]A StateActivity a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> egy állapotának felel meg

trans-unit.source: State activities could contain one or more <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>, or StateActivity classes, one <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> class, and one <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateFinalizationActivity> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy vagy több állapotjelző tevékenységeket tartalmazhatnak <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>, vagy ide a StateActivity osztályok, egy <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>osztály, és egy <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateFinalizationActivity>osztály</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateFinalizationActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>

trans-unit.source: SetState activities are used inside an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> to move the state of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: SetState tevékenységek szolgálnak belül egy <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity>és <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>helyezhető át a munkafolyamat állapotát.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity>

trans-unit.source: When a StateActivity is executing, the only events that can be received are the events that can be handled by the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities in the StateActivity and also the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities attached to the enclosing StateActivity activities and the root <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.
trans-unit.target: A StateActivity végrehajtásakor fogadhatók csak eseményeket-e a figyelmet, hogy a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>tevékenységek a StateActivity, és a is a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>tevékenységek a befoglaló ide a StateActivity tevékenységek és a legfelső szintű <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> csatlakoztatva</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> kell kezelnie

trans-unit.source: When the StateActivity starts running, the StateActivity will check to see whether a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> activity is present or not.
trans-unit.target: Ha a StateActivity elkezd futni, a StateActivity ellenőrzi, hogy egy <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>tevékenység jelen, vagy nem.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>

trans-unit.source: The StateActivity can have zero or one <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: A StateActivity állhat nulla vagy egy <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>tevékenység.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> activity is present the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> will be executed.
trans-unit.target: Ha egy <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>tevékenység megtalálható a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>fogja végrehajtani.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>

trans-unit.source: As soon as the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> activity finishes, the StateActivity blocks events so that the StateActivity only receives events that can be handled by its <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities.
trans-unit.target: Amint a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>tevékenysége befejeződik, a StateActivity blokkok események, hogy a StateActivity csak fogad eseményeket, amelyek kezelhetik a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>tevékenységek.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>

trans-unit.source: The StateActivity is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, meaning the StateActivity activity can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: A StateActivity van egy <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, tehát a StateActivity tevékenység tartalmazhat más tevékenységeket.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> osztály használata a tevékenység nevét.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: A tevékenység felhasználó által definiált neve.

trans-unit.source: Cancels the execution of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Megszakítja a végrehajtása a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The execution context for the activity.
trans-unit.target: A tevékenység végrehajtási környezet.

trans-unit.source: The current status of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> in the running workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Az aktuális állapotát a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> futó munkafolyamat-példány.

trans-unit.source: Executes the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Végrehajtja a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The execution context for the activity.
trans-unit.target: A tevékenység végrehajtási környezet.

trans-unit.source: The current status of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> in the running workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Az aktuális állapotát a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> futó munkafolyamat-példány.

trans-unit.source: Gets the executing instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that corresponds to the specified child activity name.
trans-unit.target: A végrehajtás alatt álló példányát lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> , amely megfelel a megadott gyermek tevékenység nevét.

trans-unit.source: The child activity.
trans-unit.target: A gyermektevékenység.

trans-unit.source: The dynamic child activities.
trans-unit.target: A dinamikus gyermektevékenységek.

trans-unit.source: The executable activities do not contain the childActivityName.
trans-unit.target: A végrehajtható tevékenység nem tartalmaznak a childActivityName .

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> using the service provider.
trans-unit.target: Inicializálja a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> szolgáltató használatával.

trans-unit.source: The service provider from which to obtain services.
trans-unit.target: A szolgáltató, amelyről a szolgáltatásokat.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the activity being added is an <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"></xref> and if so, verifies whether the newly added event driven needs to be subscribed.
trans-unit.target: Meghatározza, hogy a tevékenység felvett egy <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"> </xref> , és ha igen, ellenőrzi, hogy az újonnan hozzáadott esemény kell-e elő lesz fizetve.

trans-unit.source: This is method is called whenever a user adds a child to a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> through workflow changes.
trans-unit.target: Ez a módszer nevezzük, amikor a felhasználó ad hozzá egy gyermeket ehhez a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>keresztül a munkafolyamat-módosítások.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: Note that this method is defined in CompositeActivity and overridden by the StateActivity, where it checks whether the activity being added is an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> and if so, verifies if the newly added event driven needs to be subscribed.
trans-unit.target: Vegye figyelembe, hogy ez a módszer CompositeActivity meghatározott, és felülbírálják a StateActivity, amikor ellenőrzi, hogy a tevékenység felvett egy <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>, és ha igen, ellenőrzi, hogy az újonnan hozzáadott esemény kell-e elő lesz fizetve.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>

trans-unit.source: The execution context for the activity.
trans-unit.target: A tevékenység végrehajtási környezet.

trans-unit.source: The activity added to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A tevékenység hozzáadni a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime engine as part of the activity's transition to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> state.
trans-unit.target: A tevékenység áttérés részeként a munkafolyamat futásidejű motor hívása a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"> </xref> állapotát.

trans-unit.source: The service provider from which to obtain services.
trans-unit.target: A szolgáltató, amelyről a szolgáltatásokat.

trans-unit.source: Holds the string value of the change tracking data key; "StateActivity.StateChange".
trans-unit.target: A karakterlánc értéke a változáskövetési adatok kulcsot. "StateActivity.StateChange".

trans-unit.source: This field is a constant.
trans-unit.target: Ez a mező konstans.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.
